item.description:
We're trying something a little different here. Since a lot of people who attended the actual sushi meetup on 8/13 were impressed by the restaurant, Ichi-go Ichi-e, there was considerable interest in going again to try the hibachi more than the sushi. As a result, I'm co-ordinating this non-sushi meetup informally, mainly as a courtesy to try to give the restaurant a headcount.

IMPORTANT: This event will start at 6:00pm, an hour earlier than a regular sushi meetup.

For those who do not know, Japanese hibachi style restaurants seat the group around a hot-plate cooking surface and have a chef prepare meals in front of the diners, typically in a fairly elaborate and showy manner as a theatrical experience.

group.name: The Rhode Island Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Non-sushi meetup: ICHI-GO ICHI-E (East Providence), Thu, 8/27, 6:00pm
